message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a rare and valuable item that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to let it go for $25000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your enthusiasm, but I am only able to pay up to $12000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $22000. It's a fair price considering the product's value and rarity. What do you think?

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the product's value, I am still unable to meet you at $22000. I would like to propose $15000 as my maximum offer. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
